original_text: For they that are after the flesh do mind the things of the flesh; but they that are after the Spirit the things of the Spirit.
korean_text: 육신을 따르는 자는 육신의 일을, 영을 따르는 자는 영의 일을 생각하나니

sentences.original_text: For they that are after the flesh
do mind the things of the flesh;
but they that are after the Spirit
